item.title: How to Handle Unsanctioned AI Tool Use at Your Company
item.description: Speeding up work tasks with ‘shadow AI’ is tempting, but risky. It seems impossible to stop people from doing it.

item.title: The Neuroscience of Black Friday Can Help You Shop Smarter (or Sell More Stuff)
item.description: Why has Black Friday spread to countries that know nothing about Thanksgiving? Because it’s a “masterclass in behavioral science.”

item.title: A Dietician Explains Why You Shouldn’t Feel Guilty About Overeating During the Holidays
item.description: Go ahead and have that second slice of pie. Guilt around food is way worse for you than a couple of days of holiday overeating.
